District 6
==========

![Councilmember Brandon Murden profile photo](https://www.cityofmesquite.com/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=29748 "Councilmember Brandon Murden profile photo")

1. **Brandon Murden**  
   **Councilmember, District 6**  
   Current Term Expires: November 2027  
   [Email District 6](mailto:district6@cityofmesquite.com)

   Ph: 469-783-5183

   **Mailing Address**  
   City of Mesquite  
   P.O. Box 850137  
   Mesquite, TX 75185-0137

About Brandon Murden
====================

Occupation
----------

* Finance and Strategy for McKesson Corp

Personal
--------

* Mesquite resident since 2009
* Spouse Name: Marcela
* Children: Sariah, Skylar and Summer

Education
---------

* B.B.A. in International Business, University of Houston-Downtown
* M.S. in Accounting, University of Dallas
* Harvard Business School Program
* Certification: Lean Six Sigma Yellow Belt

City of Mesquite
----------------

* Planning and Zoning Commission
* Capital Improvement Advisory Committee
* Economic Development Advisory Board
* Mesquite Quality of Life Corporation Board

Community
---------

* Texas Senate Delegate, District 16 Precinct Chair
* Board of Directors: Viola’s House
* Board of Directors: 40 Miles Initiative
* Board of Directors: Desert Sands Charitable Foundation
* Board of Directors: Falcons Ridge HOA
* Toastmasters International
* Rotary Club
* Greater Southwest Black Chamber of Commerce
* Kappa Alpha Psi Fraternity, Inc.
* Prince Hall Freemason
* Odd Fellows
* Texas Municipal League Leadership Fellow
